title: Agent Management
subtitle: Manage and monitor your AI research agents

list.title: Agents Overview
list.subtitle: Manage and monitor your AI research agents

leadResearcherAgent.name: Lead Researcher Agent
leadResearcherAgent.description: Advanced lead researcher that coordinates multiple internal research agents for comprehensive research tasks using ONLY internal document repositories. Features multi-round parallel execution and adaptive research capabilities for internal data analysis.

credibilityCriticAgent.name: Credibility Critic Agent
credibilityCriticAgent.description: Analyzes credibility and coverage of internal search results using advanced LLM analysis, with ability to search for additional supporting documents. Uses memory for analysis context.

citationAgent.name: Citation Agent
citationAgent.description: Processes research documents and reports to identify specific locations for citations, ensuring all claims are properly attributed to their sources. Uses memory for citation context.

reportWriterAgent.name: Report Writer Agent
reportWriterAgent.description: Creates structured markdown reports with proper citations, hyperlinks, and visual content. Uses memory for context and component storage.

translatorAgent.name: Translator Agent
translatorAgent.description: Provides natural English-Japanese translation while preserving technical accuracy and formatting.

reflectionCriticAgent.name: Reflection Critic Agent
reflectionCriticAgent.description: Evaluates report quality for coverage, coherence, citations and provides improvement feedback. Uses memory for evaluation context.
